name: poetic poncho
notes:
materials
- 6 (8, 11) skeins of purl soho’s [vinter wool][1], 70% norwegian white sheep wool and 30% norwegian wildsheep wool. each skein of this light worsted/dk-weight yarn is approximately 120 yards/ 50 grams; approximately 680 (935, 1275) total yards required. we used the color cherry wood.
- us 6 (4 mm), 16- or 24- inch [circular knitting needles][2]

gauge
20 stitches and 29 rows = 4 inches in stockinette stitch

sizes
46 (54, 64)

to fit approximate chest circumference of 30–40 (40–50, 50–60) inches

- finished dimensions: 17 inches wide x 46 inches long (20 inches wide x 54 inches long, 23 inches wide x 64 inches long), unseamed

sample: for our sample we made the size 46.

designed by purl soho designer, [hiromi glover][3]. see even more of hiromi’s work [on her instagram][4]!


  [1]: https://www.purlsoho.com/vinter-wool.html
  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles.html
  [3]: https://www.purlsoho.com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/
  [4]: https://www.instagram.com/mignonnegrise/
